# Divination (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong divination; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 82,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Made from a supple length of willow, often with a forked tip, this staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|Detect secret doors]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Locate Object (Spell)|Locate object]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Tongues (Spell)|Tongues]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Locate Creature (Spell)|Locate creature]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Prying Eyes (Spell)|Prying eyes]]* (2 charges)
- *[[True Seeing (Spell)|True seeing]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]*, *[[Locate Creature (Spell)|locate creature]], [[Locate Object (Spell)|locate object]], [[Prying Eyes (Spell)|prying eyes]], [[Tongues (Spell)|tongues]]*, *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*

**Cost** 41,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 493
